content: In-ear headphones can be great — especially the coveted AirPods — but the one thing they can’t provide you with is long-lasting comfort. After hours of use, those earbuds can start to hurt, and you’re forced to take them out even though you're only halfway through that podcast episode. Stop punishing yourself and snag a pair of headphones that will stay comfortable all day. The Skullcandy Hesh 2 wireless over-ear headphones are a great option, and they're currently on sale for 50% off on Amazon — dropping their price down to just $50.  Skullcandy is known for their lineup of stellar sound products, and the Hesh 2 headphones are no exception. Using Supreme Sound technology, the Hesh 2 headphones produce high-fidelity sound all the way from the bass to the vocals.  SEE ALSO: Best on-ear headphones, according to online reviewers The best part about the Skullcandy heapdhones is that they’ll last you all day — not only on battery-life, but overall comfort. Their synthetic leather ear cushions provide the perfect environment for your ears to thrive for hours at a time (about 15 hours if we’re getting specific). The Hesh 2s are also completely wireless, and quickly pair via Bluetooth with your chosen device. Take full control with their on-ear controls that allow you to adjust volume and answer calls with a built-in microphone. Skullcandy even throws in a backup AUX cable for when you run out of battery but don’t have the time to charge. Save $50 on the Skullcandy Hesh 2 wireless over-ear headphones and pick them up on sale for 50% off on Amazon . Image: Amazon Skullcandy Hesh 2 wireless over-ear headphones — $49.99 See Details

Skullcandy on-ear headphones on sale: Save $50 on Amazon

Share
Tweet
What's This?
Just to let you know, if you buy something featured here, Mashable might earn an affiliate commission.
By Dylan HaasMashable Deals2019-03-18 15:23:38 UTC

In-ear headphones can be great — especially the coveted AirPods — but the one thing they can’t provide you with is long-lasting comfort. After hours of use, those earbuds can start to hurt, and you’re forced to take them out even though you're only halfway through that podcast episode. Stop punishing yourself and snag a pair of headphones that will stay comfortable all day.

The Skullcandy Hesh 2 wireless over-ear headphones are a great option, and they're currently on sale for 50% off on Amazon — dropping their price down to just $50. 

Skullcandy is known for their lineup of stellar sound products, and the Hesh 2 headphones are no exception. Using Supreme Sound technology, the Hesh 2 headphones produce high-fidelity sound all the way from the bass to the vocals. 

SEE ALSO: Best on-ear headphones, according to online reviewers

The best part about the Skullcandy heapdhones is that they’ll last you all day — not only on battery-life, but overall comfort. Their synthetic leather ear cushions provide the perfect environment for your ears to thrive for hours at a time (about 15 hours if we’re getting specific). The Hesh 2s are also completely wireless, and quickly pair via Bluetooth with your chosen device. Take full control with their on-ear controls that allow you to adjust volume and answer calls with a built-in microphone. Skullcandy even throws in a backup AUX cable for when you run out of battery but don’t have the time to charge.

Save $50 on the Skullcandy Hesh 2 wireless over-ear headphones and pick them up on sale for 50% off on Amazon.




Skullcandy Hesh 2 wireless over-ear headphones — $49.99
See Details
